com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator
Class LicenseValidateMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator.LicenseValidateMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
public class LicenseValidateMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

Maven goal for downloading the license files of all the current project's dependencies.

Author:
tdarby

Field Summary
 List<String> allowedLicenses

 boolean allowUnrecognised
          Whether to treat unmatched license dependencies as allowed or banned - true for allowed.

remoteRepositories

List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver

bannedLicenses

public List<String> bannedLicenses
List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name. Banned licenses are overriden by allowed licenses, so if a license of a dependency matches both banned and allowed, then it is deemd to be allowed

allowedLicenses

public List<String> allowedLicenses
List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name. Banned licenses are overriden by allowed licenses, so if a license of a dependency matches both banned and allowed, then it is deemd to be allowed

allowedUnlicensed

public List<String> allowedUnlicensed
List of artifacts which are allowed as long as they do not assert a license, of the form groupId:artifactId, or a RegExp match string instead of a specific dependency name (which will be matched against the artifacts by forming their groupId and artifactId as above. Bypassed artifacts automatically pass the license check, as long as they have no licenses specified - if they specify a license, they have to meet the normal rules.

allowUnrecognised

public boolean allowUnrecognised
Whether to treat unmatched license dependencies as allowed or banned - true for allowed. Default is false

failFast

public boolean failFast
Whether to bomb out on the first license error or report all errors before exiting
